Definition.WordDefinition: Tony, WI (village, FIPS 80225) Location: 45.48112 N, 90.99582 W Population (1990): 114 (50 housing units) Area: 5.3 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 54563

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Tony \To"ny\, n.; pl. {Tonies}. [Abbrev. from Anthony.] A simpleton. --L'Estrange. [1913 Webster]
A pattern and companion fit For all the keeping tonies of the pit. --Dryden. [1913 Webster]
